titleStmt.title: Saint Paules agonie A sermon preached at Leicester, at the ordinary monthly lecture: specially touching the motions of sinne, remaining in the regenerate. By A. Cade, Bacheler in Diuinity, and of Bilsdon in Leycester-shire.
titleStmt.author: Cade, Anthony, 1564?-1641.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Bernard Alsop, and are to be sold at his house by Saint Annes Church neere Aldersgate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in Harvard University. Library.
